name: 1/10 Rage against the ring
description:
A fight against the ring, 

Wait your turn to attack or dodge the ring when it's its turn.

when the screen shows attack press space to speed up and catch the ring

when the screen shows dodge press space to speed down and dodge the ring 

a bit buggy, no sound, made in approximately 10-30 Minutes with P5.js

my first entry for 10 mini-games Jam. enjoy
